DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether infant feed formula protein level different standard infant formula similar growth development .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Level Dietary Protein Infant Growth
DOC.criteria: Gestational age least 37 week Singleton birth Birth weight 2500g 4500g Weight enrolment 5th percentile ( CDC ) Infant exclusively formula feed least last 14 day Having obtain informed consent legal representative Congenital illness malformation affect infant feed and/or growth Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Suspected confirm allergy cow milk protein In investigator assessment , infant 's family expect comply treatment ( feed regimen ) Currently participate another clinical trial
